title: I am bored of Lee Sin
body: I want to tear my hair off everytime I see he gets buffs. I see that cancerous champion in almost all of my games and I can ban only one champion ({{champion:157}}/{{champion:238}}/{{champion:142}}/{{champion:105}}/{{champion:91}} ) He is not OP but either in my team or in enemy team he is really annoying and why can he still ward jump? Remove it like you removed {{champion:55}} 's. I don't care if he has low win rate. Don't pick him if you can't play him.

How to play against Lee Sin: Wait patiently for him to finally make a mistake, only to be disappointed as he escapes with ease.

How to play with Lee Sin: Watch as Lee Sin pulls of "amazing" read (standard and fairly simple) plays and gets hugely rewarded, being reminded that you're a second class citizen because you're not Lee Sin.

How to watch Lee Sin: Don't.
So ban him, and enough pouring the salt tears.

> [{quoted}](name=WøOxer,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wVTdVn80,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-08-06T13:01:47.672+0000)
>
> So ban him, and enough pouring the salt tears.

Lee legitimately gets buffed every time he so much as catches a whiff of the gutters and the eSports season start rolling in. It's pretty blatant favoritism.
I'm waiting for the inevitable Nidalee buff.

I have {{item:3070}} Magical Tears {{item:3070}} jokes on you. 

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/9/91/Unbenched_Emote.png/revision/latest?cb=20171106215614

Lee hasn't been good since forever, he will not be good with these buffs either because he was balanced around ward hopping and since he can't do that enough times for it be an actual threat anymore i don't get how is it that we after so many years keep beating the dead horse.

Lee Sin wasn't good when Riot removed the ward jungle item and he isn't good right now even with the buffs.
lee sin has always been good, since his release he has never been at the bottom of the food chain.
Remember when Lee and Leblanc were the most mobile champions in the game and that was about it lol.

> [{quoted}](name=LeftyRaydy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wVTdVn80,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-08-06T22:37:19.767+0000)
>
> Remember when Lee and Leblanc were the most mobile champions in the game and that was about it lol.

There was honestly so much more room for strategic and tactical play when everybody didn't have a massive gap closer, and you had to be actually careful because you didn't have a get out of jail free card. Ganking and getting a flash was _huge_, now it hardly even feels like an accomplishment because they have so much other mobility.

Often people will say that the counterplay is not to get in melee range of Lee. But that's literally not possible, he has double Dashes (Q & W), a Blink (Flash) and on top of all that his base Movement Speed is quite high (345 where most immobile champions movement speed lingers between 325-335).

How do you get away from that exactly?
